info.name: Dark Cracked 2016
info.description:
A quick and dirty modification of DarkanX's Cracked 2016 Wide & Trimmed
Original: https://userstyles.org/styles/90019/cracked-2016-wide-trimmed

Note: As I couldn't find a dark theme that was functional for the current site, I made this quick and dirty for myself. Because of that, there are probably areas of the site missing some TLC in the places where I don't go (such as the forums).
info.additionalInfo:
UPDATE 12/2/16:
- Fixed the Menu on the new video viewing pages. There's still some more quirks to tackle on there, will tackle those as time allows, but entire page is dark again.

UPDATE 10/3/16:
- Added dark background for new infinite loader div.

UPDATE 6/15/16:
- A number of cosmetic changes including fixing sub-title legibility on hover, article mis-align on load prior to scrolling on new template, new nav menu dropdown widths and coloring, correcting comments adjustments by devs, some preliminary work on non-article/front page sections.

UPDATE 5/31/16:
- Fixed legibility on newest page template.
Note: They've made a completely new stylesheet for the menu bar on the new page template. I have not addressed it in this quick push update as it's still fully functional, but I will theme it sometime in the next week or so.

UPDATE 5/23/16:
- Fixed portions of the responsive style being dropped when the browser window is smaller than 993px (and again at 768px).
- Re-added attribution in the code for DarkanX (Had accidentally deleted it. Sorry DarkanX!)

UPDATE 5/4/16:
- Devs messed with the the comments again causing the text to be blacked out. This has been fixed along with a few other minor touch-ups.

UPDATE 4/11/16:
- AJAX-based comment sections are back to being dark.
